== Kannamangalam (CT) (627547) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Kannamangalam (CT) is a town in the [[Tirurangadi]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 28.24 sq. km. and harbouring 7194 households with total population of 41260 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 17 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 435 km. Male population is 19911 and female population is 21349. Scheduled Caste population is 3562 and Scheduled Tribes population is 181. Census Location Code of the town is 627547<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (Population 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 17 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Parappanangadi at a distance of 15 km.
